articles.description: Oriol Romeu was a ready-made Claude Makelele replacement but Chelsea and Mourinho let him leave on the cheap
articles.content:
In September 2012 Chelsea thrashed Wolves 6-0 in the League Cup, with four Spaniards starring for the Blues that day.
The two most famous of that quartet were Juan Mata and Fernando Torres but it is… [+4383 chars]

articles.title: Recent Match Report - Afghanistan vs Ireland 1st ODI 2020/21 - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Rashid Khan blasts 55 off 30 and takes two wickets as Lorcan Tucker, Andy McBrine career-bests go in vain
articles.content:
Afghanistan 287 for 9 (Gurbaz 127, Khan 55) beat Ireland 271 for 9 (Tucker 83, Naveen 3-68) by 16 runs
A boundary-laden century on debut from 19-year-old Rahmanullah Gurbaz led Afghanistan to their … [+2185 chars]

articles.title: "I Will Kiss Where He Is Hurt": Cheteshwar Pujara's Daughter Aditi On How To Heal Father's Pain - NDTV Sports
articles.description: After battling out in Brisbane where he copped several blows to the body, Cheteshwar Pujara returned to his family where daughter Aditi was ready with a special remedy.
articles.content: The sight of Cheteshwar Pujara copping body blows during the second innings of the fourth Test against Australia was intimidating for his family. Even as his wife Puja cringed and took her eyes away … [+1390 chars]

articles.description: India Test star Hanuma Vihari has hailed Rahul Dravid for the way he coached India's youngsters while serving as India A coach.
